content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to execute Python code to generate a river map using the 'arcgis' module. The code added the correct path to the 'arcgis' module to the system path, connected to ArcGIS Online, created a new web map, added a feature layer to the map, and saved it with the title "River Map" and a snippet "A map of rivers in the USA". Command execute_shell_popen returned: Subprocess started with PID:'4688'. I received a message to execute the command "pip show arcgis" which returned a subprocess with PID:'4785'. I executed the command "python --version" which returned a subprocess with PID:'4788'.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
